Name: Objective

Options.Description: Korali will find the point of minimum evaluation of the provided model.
Korali will find the point of maximum evaluation of the provided model.

Configuration Settings.Description: Indicates whether Korali will minimize or maximize the objective evaluation.

Name: Lower Bound
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the lower bound for the variable's value.

Name: Upper Bound
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the upper bound for the variable's value.
